tickets.reason: Lifecycle receipt schemas and required field contracts must be defined first.

in_scope: Implement direct authority_seal_hash authentication path for authoritative lifecycle receipts.
Implement pointer/batched receipt authentication path with inclusion-proof and batch-root validation.
Fail closed when envelope/view/time or seal/pointer proof bindings are missing.
Enforce routing-fact vs acceptance-fact distinction in replay/adjudication paths.
out_of_scope: Distributed consensus redesign for receipt storage.
Non-authoritative telemetry/event forwarding behavior beyond classification.

steps: Add verifier support for direct and pointer/batched receipt-authentication shapes.
Bind mandatory authoritative fields into acceptance checks and deny taxonomy.
Add replay/adjudication tests for missing-binding and malformed-proof denial cases.
Add positive tests for both direct and pointer authentication shapes.
Run cargo fmt --all && cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings && cargo test --workspace.

criteria: Authoritative acceptance requires admissible direct or pointer receipt authentication.
Missing required authoritative bindings are denied in replay/adjudication.
Forwarded raw bytes without admissible auth proof are treated as non-authoritative.

notes.security: Acceptance-fact checks are authority-critical and must fail closed on any unknown or incomplete proof state.
notes.verification: Include dual-path (direct/pointer) verification vectors and malformed inclusion-proof tests.
